title: Can't connect to game
body: I make it into champ select but when the game tries to load i crash, when i hit reconnect it just crashes again.

replies.body: By crash I'm assuming you mean bugsplat.  In this case, something like a bad game file or driver is failing to load the game.  Go over the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get that fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
